item.title: 高盛首席执行官所罗门认为信贷市场不存在 "系统性危机
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.首席执行官大卫-所罗门（David Solomon）淡化了美国公司 First Brands Group 和 Tricolor Holdings 倒闭后出现的担忧，并表示他不认为信贷市场存在任何系统性风险。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. Chief Executive Officer David Solomon downplayed concerns that have surfaced following the collapse of US firms First Brands Group and Tricolor Holdings, and said he doesn’t see any systemic risk looming in the credit market.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利证券、拉里-芬克、杰米-戴蒙等出席利雅得 FII 会议
item.description: 沙特王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼 摄影师：Fayez Nureldine/FP【原文：Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman Photographer: FAYEZ NURELDINE/AFP】

item.title: 三星 SDI 寄望机器人电池缓解关税冲击
item.description: 三星 SDI 公司正在与多功能仿人机器人制造商洽谈电池供应事宜，以寻求实现收入来源多元化，缓解美国关税和全球电动汽车需求不振带来的影响。【原文：Samsung SDI Co. is in talks with multirole humanoid robot makers to supply batteries as it seeks to diversify revenue sources to cushion the impact from US tariffs and tepid global demand for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 韩国央行在长期中断后可能在中期购买黄金
item.description: 韩国央行正在权衡十多年来首次增加黄金储备的计划，有可能加入全球货币当局的购买浪潮，这股浪潮助推金银价格屡创新高。【原文：South Korea’s central bank is weighing plans to add to its gold reserves for the first time in more than a decade, potentially joining a wave of purchases by monetary authorities around the world that helped push bullion prices to record highs.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德称私募信贷不会挤占私募股权投资的份额
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. ）的私募股权主管 Anuj Ranjan 认为，该行业与私人信贷并驾齐驱。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.’s head of private equity Anuj Ranjan sees the sector growing side by side with private credit.】

item.title: 印度公司将珍贵的欧洲资产收入囊中放眼海外
item.description: 欧洲正成为渴望收购的印度公司的繁忙狩猎场，因为它们正试图进行全球扩张、引进新资产并磨练自己的技术能力。【原文：Europe is becoming a busy hunting ground for Indian companies eager for acquisitions as they attempt to expand globally, bring in new assets and hone their technical chops.】

item.title: 欧洲柴油和航空燃油进口激增，贸易商为俄罗斯制裁做好准备
item.description: 欧洲的柴油和航空燃油进口量将在本月创下历史新高，因为贸易商们正在为冬季的到来做准备，同时俄罗斯原油制成的石油产品也将受到限制。【原文：Europe’s imports of diesel and jet fuel are on course for a record-breaking month, as traders gear up for the winter and a clampdown on petroleum products made with Russian crude.】

item.title: 泰国央行行长希望加倍购买坏账
item.description: 泰国央行行长威泰-拉塔纳孔（Vitai Ratanakorn）表示，泰国央行希望全国的资产管理公司将不良贷款购买量增加一倍，以帮助解决高额的家庭债务问题。【原文：The Bank of Thailand wants the nation’s asset management companies to double their bad-loan purchases to help solve the high household debt problem, according to Governor Vitai Ratanakorn.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行允许市场力量决定外汇走势
item.description: 菲律宾央行允许美元兑比索汇率由市场力量决定，相信本币有包括强劲汇款流入在内的有利经济基本面作为支撑。【原文：The Philippine central bank is allowing the dollar-peso exchange rate to be determined by market forces, confident that the local currency is backed by favorable economic fundamentals including robust remittance inflows.】

item.title: 大豆在特朗普和习近平举行贸易谈判前扩大涨幅
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和中国国家主席习近平（Xi Jinping）预计于周四举行会晤以敲定一项范围广泛的贸易协议之前，大豆连续第二个交易日走高。【原文：Soybeans pushed higher for a second session ahead of meeting between US President Donald Trump and his counterpart Xi Jinping expected for Thursday to finalize a wide-ranging trade deal.】

item.title: 钱德拉-阿斯利（Chandra Asri）正在与贷款人谈判，为埃索公司 10 亿美元的交易提供资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印尼能源和化工公司 PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk 正在与相互竞争的贷款财团谈判贷款事宜，以支持其从埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：PT Chandra Asri Pacific Tbk, an Indonesian energy and chemicals firm, is in talks with competing consortiums of lenders for loans to back its $1 billion purchase of Esso-branded service stations in Singapore from Exxon Mobil Corp., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度国有炼油企业权衡制裁后的俄罗斯石油选择
item.description: 印度的国营炼油厂正在考虑，他们是否可以通过依靠小供应商而不是能源巨头俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）和卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC），继续接受一些打折的俄罗斯石油货物，这两家公司上周都被美国列入了黑名单。【原文：India’s state-run refiners are considering whether they can continue to take some discounted Russian oil cargoes by leaning on small suppliers instead of energy giants Rosneft PJSC and Lukoil PJSC, both blacklisted by the US last week.】

item.title: 社交媒体禁令临近，大型科技公司在澳大利亚倒戈相向
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.、Snap Inc.和 ByteDance Ltd. 旗下的 TikTok 表示，它们将遵守澳大利亚即将出台的针对 16 岁以下儿童的社交媒体禁令，在禁令生效前几周搁置反对意见。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc., Snap Inc. and ByteDance Ltd.’s TikTok said they’ll comply with Australia’s looming social-media ban for under-16s, setting aside their opposition just weeks before it comes into force.】

item.title: 美国制裁阻碍中国购买，俄罗斯主要石油等级下滑
item.description: 在西方制裁促使中国炼油商取消部分采购后，俄罗斯一种重要等级石油的价格暴跌。【原文：The price of a key Russian oil grade has plunged after Western sanctions prompted Chinese refiners to cancel some purchases.】

item.title: 日本口头干预后日元表现优于十国集团同类货币
item.description: 由于市场对日本官员的支持性言论表示欢迎，并对美日领导人在东京举行的高规格会议的成果感到高兴，日元周二走高，表现好于十国集团中的其他国家。【原文：The yen advanced on Tuesday, outperforming its Group-of-10 peers, as markets welcomed supportive remarks from Japanese officials and cheered the outcome of a high-profile meeting between US and Japanese leaders in Tokyo.】

item.title: 施罗德因 Purbaya 和 BI 赌注而首选印尼债券
item.description: 施罗德投资管理公司（Schroder Investment Management）看好印尼债券和印尼盾，认为它们是亚洲的首选，并押注政府促进增长的努力和进一步降息的预期将吸引外资流入。【原文：Schroder Investment Management favors Indonesian bonds and the rupiah as its top picks in Asia, betting that government efforts to boost growth and expectations of further interest-rate cuts will draw foreign inflows.】

item.title: 特朗普邀请日本参与确保关键矿产供应的行动
item.description: 美国和日本签署了一项深化关键矿产合作的协议，使这个亚洲国家加入了华盛顿减少对中国依赖的行列。【原文：The US and Japan have signed an agreement to deepen cooperation on critical minerals, adding the Asian country to Washington’s push to reduce its reliance on China.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）关注低自由浮动的印尼股票，可能会刺激资金外流
item.description: 花旗集团称，由于摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：Indonesian stocks may suffer outflows, according to Citigroup Inc., as MSCI Inc. flags potential changes to its index weightings for companies with certain shareholding structures.】

item.title: 中国人民银行重返市场，有望恢复债券购买
item.description: 分析师称，中国人民银行很可能恢复债务购买，以标志其自一月份以来首次重返债券交易。【原文：The People’s Bank of China is likely to resume debt purchases to mark its return to bond trading for the first time since January, analysts say.】

item.title: 全球焦虑加剧，中国人民银行行长警告稳定币风险
item.description: 中国人民银行行长潘功胜加强了对稳定币风险的警告，因为这种通常与法定货币挂钩的数字代币在全球官员中激起了更多的忧虑。【原文：People’s Bank of China Governor Pan Gongsheng stiffened warnings on the risks around stablecoins, as the digital tokens usually pegged to fiat currencies stir more angst among officials around the world.】

item.title: 印度银行股势头强劲，公开兴趣上升，估值诱人
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势缓解，沪指突破十年区间
item.description: 中国主要股指十年来首次短暂突破关键心理关口，反映出随着贸易紧张局势的缓和，投资者对前景持谨慎但大致乐观的态度。【原文：A major Chinese stock index briefly broke above a key psychological barrier for the first time in a decade, reflecting investors’ cautious but broadly upbeat outlook as trade tensions ease.】

item.title: 中国顶级电力游说团表示已为冬季需求激增做好准备
item.description: 中国的电力公司相信，充足的煤炭和天然气供应，以及丰富的可再生能源，将使他们能够在不出现意外的情况下满足通常年底激增的需求。【原文：China’s electricity companies are confident that ample coal and gas supplies, and an abundance of renewables, will allow them to meet the usual end-year surge in demand without upset.】

item.title: 印尼矿商安塔姆公司净收入因黄金需求而飙升
item.description: 由于贵金属需求强劲，黄金销售量激增，印尼国有矿商 PT Aneka Tambang 今年前九个月的净收入增长了一倍多。【原文：Indonesian state miner PT Aneka Tambang more than doubled its net income in the first nine months of the year, driven by a surge in gold sales amid strong demand for the precious metal.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索因利率观点和资金外流跌至历史新低
item.description: 菲律宾比索跌至历史新低，原因是更多降息前景和股票进一步外流的压力越来越大。【原文：The Philippine peso fell to a new record low on mounting pressure from the prospect of more interest-rate cuts and further stock outflows.】

item.title: BE 称美中贸易缓和将限制关税对双方的打击
item.description: 彭博经济周刊》写道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国总统习近平达成的贸易缓和协议将限制关税对两国经济的打击，并使中国政府保持对美国的大部分出口。【原文：A trade detente agreed between US President Donald Trump and his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping would limit the tariff blow to both economies and see Beijing maintain the bulk of its exports to America, Bloomberg Economics writes.】

item.title: 孟加拉国和巴基斯坦誓言在二十年后促进贸易关系
item.description: 孟加拉国和巴基斯坦承诺将经济、贸易和投资关系提升到 "新的战略高度"，这进一步表明这对昔日敌人之间的关系正在升温。【原文：Bangladesh and Pakistan pledged to elevate economic, trade and investment relations to a “new strategic level” in a further sign of warming ties between the former foes.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易协议让美国在东南亚占据优势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普来到东南亚，挥舞着被其办公室誉为 "历史性 "的贸易协议。不过，从更细微的细节来看，这一系列协议并不平衡，存在很多未知数。【原文：US President Donald Trump came to Southeast Asia wielding trade deals his office hailed as “historic.” The finer details, though, suggest a set of agreements that are uneven and with plenty of unknowns.】

item.title: 多米诺比萨企业因贝恩有意收购的报道而飙升
item.description: 在《澳大利亚金融评论报》报道贝恩资本正在考虑收购这家快餐连锁店，交易价值高达 40 亿澳元（26 亿美元）之后，多米诺比萨企业有限公司的股价飙升。【原文：Domino’s Pizza Enterprises Ltd. shares soared after the Australian Financial Review reported Bain Capital is considering buying the fast-food chain in a deal worth as much as A$4 billion ($2.6 billion).】

item.title: 红杉资本投资可取代初级银行家的人工智能工具
item.description:
Rogo称其人工智能平台可帮助投资银行家更快、更智能地开展工作。【原文：

Rogo says its AI platform helps investment bankers worker faster and smarter.

】
